goal: Track successful contact form submissions with analytics and ensure no sensitive data is included.
non_goals: Selecting or configuring a new analytics provider
Tracking failed submissions or additional form fields beyond the required event
acceptance_criteria: Record a contact_form_submitted event on successful form submissions
Include source page metadata without any user-entered data
Unit test verifies analytics tracking is triggered
approach: Add an analytics event call in ContactForm.tsx after a successful submit and use the current pathname as non-sensitive metadata. Mock analytics in unit tests to assert the event is fired.
risks: Accidentally including sensitive user input in analytics payloads
rollback_plan: Revert the analytics event call and the associated unit test changes.
